title: Accessibility problems
description: When using the application, I am experiencing accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working properly.
OB: The application requires users to click on one of the 'live' areas before it becomes functional.
SR: On March 26, 2002, while using Windows 2000, I encountered an issue in the Help view where the tab key does not function as expected.
